name: Toast Butters!
description:
A poorly made scratch game about bread traveling through time just to get butter!

- Not finished!

- Playable together! (2p compatible)

- For the Scratch Community Game Jam (Scratch Community Game Jam - itch.io), using the useful tools of Turbowarp!

- if you found a bug/glitch, comment about it! i will do my best to fix it asap!
